summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new features: Recurring Bookings, Waitlist System, and Reminder Scheduler. All 17 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend UI verified: recurring dialog opens correctly with 2/4/6/8 week options, Join Waitlist button appears on full slots, Leave Waitlist button appears when user is on waitlist, 'From Waitlist' badge displays on promoted bookings. Reminder scheduler starts on application startup.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/waitlist/my returns user's waitlist entries
Backend: GET /api/bookings/slots/{date} returns waitlist_count and user_on_waitlist
Backend: POST /api/waitlist requires slot to be full
Backend: DELETE /api/waitlist/{id} removes from waitlist
Backend: Waitlist endpoints require authentication
Backend: POST /api/bookings with is_recurring=true creates multiple bookings
Backend: Bookings have reminder_24h_sent and reminder_1h_sent flags
Backend: BookingCreate model accepts is_recurring and recurring_weeks
Backend: Cancellation triggers waitlist promotion
Backend: Waitlist promotion creates 'You're In!' notification
Backend: Reminder flags initialized to False on new bookings
Backend: GET /api/bookings/my returns from_waitlist flag
Backend: GET /api/bookings/my returns is_recurring flag
Backend: Slot endpoint returns user_waitlist_position
Backend: GET /api/waitlist/slot/{date}/{time_slot} returns waitlist details
Backend: WaitlistEntry has correct structure
Backend: Reminder scheduler starts on application startup
Frontend: Recurring booking dialog opens when clicking repeat icon
Frontend: Dialog shows 2, 4, 6, 8 week options
Frontend: Session preview list displays in recurring dialog
Frontend: 'Full' badge displays on full slots
Frontend: 'Join Waitlist' button appears when slot is full
Frontend: 'From Waitlist' badge displays on promoted bookings
Frontend: My Bookings page shows upcoming sessions section
seed_data_creation: Created waitlisttest@test.com user for testing Join Waitlist button
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features (Recurring Bookings, Waitlist, Reminders) are fully functional. Feb 20 afternoon slot is full with 3 bookings (SA, TT, TT). testuser3 was promoted from waitlist and has 'You're In!' notification. Reminder scheduler runs every 15 minutes checking for 24h and 1h reminders. Waitlist auto-reorders when someone leaves.
rca_of_the_issue: N/A - No bugs found. All features working as designed.
